text: The ACIP expert group meets this afternoon @CDCgov to figure out what to do about the J&J #COVID19 #vaccine vis-a-vis blood clots. Should be assessing all adenovirus vector vaxes at once: #SputnikV @AstraZeneca & J&J, to see if it's a universal problem w/adeno class of vaxes. https://t.co/pKM2F230wB
